DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the applicability and utility of Gerd Q in the diagnosis of GERD and in the assessment of treatment response.
DOC.brief_title: Diagnosis and Response to Treatment Using a Reliable Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD) Questionnaire: An In Clinical Practice Study
DOC.criteria: Patients of either gender aged between 1879 years of age Patients must be having symptoms of gastroesophageal reflux disease
